thing-type.label: Homie MQTT Device
thing-type.description: You need a configured Broker first. This thing represents a device, that follows the "MQTT Homie Convention" (Version 3.x).

parameter.name: deviceid
parameter.label: Device ID
parameter.description: Homie Device ID. This is part of the MQTT topic, e.g. "homie/deviceid/$homie".

parameter.name: basetopic
parameter.label: Domain
parameter.description: The MQTT base prefix, not including any Homie convention version.

parameter.name: homieVersion
parameter.label: Homie Convention Version
parameter.description: Which version of the Homie convention specification this device conforms to.

parameter.name: removetopics
parameter.label: Remove Retained Topics
parameter.description: Remove retained topics when thing is deleted
